Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.GamePlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGamePlayModel

    public class GamePlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGamePlayModel
    Manages the state of game play.

      • setGameState

        public void setGameState(GameState p_game_state)
        Set the state of the game. The setting affects which methods can be processed in a given state.
        Specified by:
        setGameState in interface IGamePlayModel
        Parameters:
        p_game_state - the new game state.

      • setMap

        public void setMap(IMapModel p_map)
        Set the game play map. Only available in GameState.Startup.
        Specified by:

        p_map - the map used for the game

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(IPlayerModel p_player)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a player to the game. If a player with the same name exists then the request is ignored. Only available in GameState.Startup.
        Specified by:
        addPlayer in interface IGamePlayModel
        Parameters:
        p_player - the new player to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error, or if the player already exists

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(java.lang.String p_name)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove a player to the game. If a player doesn't exist then the request is ignored. Only available in GameState.Startup.
        Specified by:
        removePlayer in interface IGamePlayModel
        Parameters:
        p_name - the player to remove
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error, or if the player does not exist

      • assignCountries

        public void assignCountries()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Assign countries to the players. All countries are randomly assigned to players. Only available in GameState.Startup. Upon successfully assigning all countries the game state is changed to game play.
        Specified by:
        assignCountries in interface IGamePlayModel
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error

      • assignReinforcements

        public void assignReinforcements()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Assign to each player the correct number of reinforcement armies according to the Warzone rules. Only available in GameState.GamePlay. 
         formula:
 (max(3, # of countries the player own/3)+(continent value of all continents controlled by the player))
        Specified by:
        assignReinforcements in interface IGamePlayModel
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error

      • executeOrders

        public void executeOrders()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the next_order() method of the Player. Then the Order object’s execute() method is called, which will enact the order. The effect of a deploy order is to place num armies on the country countryID. Only available in GameState.GamePlay.
        Specified by:
        executeOrders in interface IGamePlayModel
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error

      • assignCard

        public void assignCard()
